projects.title: Inkprov
projects.description: A real-time collabrative writing app that allows users to create and share stories using the Improv concept of "yes... and".

projects.title: ExploreNation
projects.description: A mobile travel app that helps you find and explore amazing attractions around the world or near you.

projects.title: Gourmet Guide
projects.description: An application for users to explore and discover different foods from around the world.
